questions.question_text: What are two critical networking challenges? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AE
@7:09 
Security AM Module 7 and SE Module 9 Securing Next-Generation Networks - Video

Visibility, Segmentation, Threat Protection

C is correct.

https://blogs.cisco.com/security/cisco-amp-for-endpoints-excelling-in-av-comparatives-business-main-test-series
Over the course of two months, the products encountered 389 test cases. Of the 389 test cases, Cisco AMP For Endpoints has blocked all but three while producing ZERO false alarms. Resulting in a 99.2% protection rate so far. Cisco AMP For Endpoints is only one of three products to have zero false alarms. Others have already flagged up to 18 false alarms.

Selected Answer: C
https://www.cisco.com/c/es_mx/products/security/asa-firepower-services/index.html#~stickynav=1
"This NGFW received the best safety efficacy ratings in third-party tests by NGIPS and AMP, blocking 99.4% and 99.2% of threats, respectively."

questions.question_text: Which two attack vectors are protected by Web Security? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
@12:16 - Security AM and SE Module 1 Threat Landscape and Security Issues - Video
Mobile, Cloud, Web, Endpoints, Campus+Branch, IOT Devices, Data Center, Corporate WAN

AB and D are all viable here. Sticking with Cloud and Web since they each have their own box in the video, where Data Center is lumped in with the enterprise network
